numberOfLanes.description: number of lanes (single ended or differential) supported by a device

interface.description: list of interface(s) supported by a device

dpMaxLinkRate.description: maximum interface speed supported by DP interface of a device

maxDataRate.description: maximum data rate supported by a device

integratedAuxLsSwitch.description: whether the AUX/LSx switch for SBU is integrated

commonClock.description: whether a device supports common reference clock

sris.description: whether a device supports Seperate Reference clock with Independent Spread spectrum clocking(SRIS)

srns.description: whether a device supports Seperate Reference clock with No Spread spectrum clocking (SRNS)

currentConsumption.description: current used by device in various power modes
